amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide a limiting exception for construction projects that could be potential targets for terrorist acts, such as chemical facilities, nuclear power plants, and other critical infrastructure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 114-261 to preserve the current law relating to the permitting projects that could be a potential target for a terrorist attack or that involves chemical facilities and other critical infrastructure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 232 (Roll no. 515).

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 232 (Roll no. 515).
